display_help: The Lee-Enfield Rifle is an old relic of WW1, but still very deadly. Fires a single slug at a targeted foe at good range. Has a small chance to knock down foes.
display_target_help: The Lee-Enfield Rifle is an old relic of WW1, but still very deadly. Fires a single slug at a targeted foe at good range. Has a small chance to knock down foes.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!
